content: अभिसृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go up to, go towards, approach; to go to some place or other, go or proceed; पुरोभिसस्रे सुरसुंदरीजनैः <ls>Ki. 8. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To attack, assail. {@--3@} To go or advance to meet (as at an appointed place); सुंदरीरभिससार <ls>K. 58</ls>; <ls>Dk. 51</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">52</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">91</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 26.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To visit, approach, go to meet; वल्लभानभिसिसारयिषूणां <ls n="Śi.">10. 20</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 10.">21</ls>; <ls>S. D. 115</ls>; <ls>Ki. 9. 38</ls>; <ls>Mk. 8.</ls>
